Articles.Content:
Hello all,

Just a little showcase of the Pheos Enhanced Mobility Explorer Vehicle.

(ALL STOCK) No mods, no mech jeb. Still flies like a peach.

Capable of:

-Advanced hover maneuvers and forward flight on Munar low gravity zero atmosphere environments.

-Smooth flight on planetary bodies by swapping the rear thrust-er with an atmospheric jet.

-Easily capable of "Brute Forcing" to the Mun and Minmus, with plenty of fuel to spare for return to Kerbin or follow on to other Munar bodies.

Hope you enjoy and let me know what you think.

Have other vehicles I may show.

Edited September 17, 2012 by Exclipse
